name: Multi-Hit Moves
flavor: And another one! And another one! And...
text:
- Moves with Successive, Double or Triple Action hit multiple times. Every successive hit has a -2 accuracy reduction.
- Double Action moves hit up to 2 times, Triple Action moves up to 3 times maximum.
- Keep rolling accuracy until the hit fails, then roll damage as often as you had successful accuracy rolls.
- Only your first strike can critical hit.
